data.title: About | Tech & Business - techandbusiness.org
data.snippet:
### Pierce Berke

Co-Founder & Content Creator

Amherst student and podcast co-host. Brings insights on technology trends and student perspectives.

### Joey Summa

Founding Staff & Finance

Syracuse student specializing in financial analysis and market commentary. Content creator focused on business fundamentals.

## Our Content

### Videos & Reels

Quick takes on market trends, tech news, and business insights from our team.

### Podcast

Long-form conversations exploring the intersection of technology and business.

### Articles

In-depth analysis and commentary on the topics that matter to students. [...] ## Sign In

Continue to Tech & Business

# About Tech & Business

Tech & Business is a student-run media platform providing an informed perspective on the real-time workings of technology, artificial intelligence, and the world of business.

We started as a newsletter and have evolved into a video-first platform, creating content that makes complex topics accessible to college students and young professionals. Our mission is to build a network where ambitious individuals can learn, connect, and grow together.

## The Team

### Leo Duarte

Co-Founder: Infrastructure & Design

Technical lead and entrepreneur focused on building systems and infrastructure. Responsible for the platform architecture and design.

### Pierce Berke

Co-Founder & Content Creator
